metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20372 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: NGINX before 1.17.7, with certain error_page configurations, allows HTTP request smuggling, as demonstrated by the ability of an attacker to read unauthorized web pages in environments where NGINX is being fronted by a load balancer.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Bert JW Regeer and Francisco Oca Gonzalez

criterions.comment: nginx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
